content:
You're all caught up on "Stranger Things" season 4! That was indeed an intense season.

As for your question, I don't have a personal list, but I can give you some information on upcoming Netflix original series and movies. Netflix typically announces release dates and titles through their social media channels, news outlets, and their quarterly earnings reports.

That being said, here are a few upcoming Netflix original titles that have been announced:

* "The Sandman" (August 2022) - a live-action adaptation of the popular comic book series
* "Wednesday" (fall 2022) - a live-action Addams Family series focused on Wednesday Addams
* "Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery" (late 2022) - a sequel to the hit whodunit film "Knives Out"
* "The School for Good and Evil" (fall 2022) - a fantasy film based on the popular book series
* "Wednesday" (fall 2022) - a live-action Addams Family series focused on Wednesday Addams
* "1899" (late 2022) - a horror series from the creators of "Dark"
* "The Witcher: Blood Origin" (late 2022) - a prequel series to "The Witcher"

Keep an eye on Netflix's social media channels and website for more announcements and release dates. You can also check out online entertainment news outlets like Variety, The Hollywood Reporter, or Collider for the latest updates on upcoming Netflix originals.

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!
